displayData.paragraph: Kisan Credit Card Scheme aims at providing need based and timely credit support from the banking system to farmer for their agriculture and allied activity needs as well as non-farm activities.

sectionContent.paragraphData: Please review the principle terms and disclosure of charges for availing the higher limit

cat:
• Processing Fees - NIL

  • Personal Accident Insurance Fees - To be borne by applicant as & when debited in the account by insurance company.

  • Crop Insurance Fees -To be paid by applicant as & when debited in the account by insurance company.

  • Other Charges -
    1. Stamping charges as per state law
    2. ATM(Debit) Card Charges-Rs.

data.title: Total Interest Charge During Entire Tenor Of Loan

cat: Total Interest charged will be based on the daily product yearly compounding at the rate of
% p.a will be charged asper DFS notification. Upon timely Repayment
% prompt Repayment Incentive is available.The ROI is MCLR linked and the MCLR may be reset by bank at such intervals as it may deem fit

data.title: Total amount to be paid by borrower in Year1
data.data: Limit amount + Interest + Other upfront charges.

cat: Total Interest charged will be based on the daily product yearly compounding at the rate of
% p.a will be charged asper DFS notification. Upon timely Repayment
% prompt Repayment Incentive is available.The ROI is MCLR linked and the MCLR may be reset by bank at such intervals as it may deem fit

data.title: Tenor of The Loan
data.data: Initially for the period of 5 year, account to be renewed annually

data.title: Repayment frequency by the Borrower
data.data: Payable on demand or as per harvesting and marketing period of the crops. Each drawal to be repaid with applicable interest and other charges within two crop seasons(for short duration crops) and within one crop season(for long duration crops).Crop season will be defined as per the notification of SLBC of respective state.

data.title: Cooling Off/Look Up Period
data.data: 3 days. No additional charges only interim period interest to be serviced on prepayment of loan.
